data.enText: a large board on the outside of a building or at the side of the road, used for putting advertisements on
a temporary fence made of boards that is placed around an area of land until a building has been built
data.chText: （建筑工地用木板搭起的）临时围栏

means: (建筑工地用木板搭起的)临时围栏

example.ex: An advertising hoarding on the platform caught her attention.
example.tran: 站台上的一幅巨幅广告牌吸引了她的注意力。

value.def: A hoarding is a very large board at the side of a road or on the side of a building, which is used for displaying advertisements and posters.
value.tran: （路旁或建筑物侧面的）巨幅广告牌，告示牌

value.boxr_value: in AM, usually use 美国英语通常用 billboard
